form.name: form1

p.span: Following Governor Beshear's recommendation, Graves County Schools will be closed for the remainder of the school year. We will utilize NTI (Non-Traditional Instruction) days for each day.

a.span: Meal Pickup and Delivery is now limited to Monday and Wednesday only. Monday pickup and delivery will be for Monday and Tuesday meals. Wednesday pickup and delivery will be for Wednesday, Thursday, and Friday meals. Click here to order meals for NTI Week 6 (April 27 - May 1).

p.span: For more information about food service, call the food service hotline at 270-328-1560 or email at GCS.NTIFOOD@graves.kyschools.us.
